page.title: 07THATCHING IN WARDOUR
page.content: Mr. Jukes is the{thatcher.}He has been thatching since he was very small.It took{3 years}training,and he has been going seriously for 8 years.He was trained near{Mere,}and travels about 30 miles.It takes 4 months to thatch a large house,and 1 month to do a cottage.He uses{straw which is cut with an old-fashioned {binder.}His{tools}are:Sheepshears, leggits (a sort of comb) a special needle,wooden spars,a spar hook and a ladder.He works in all kinds of {weather,}and in the summer he starts work at about{4a.m.}He thatches 8-10 {roofs}a year, and they usually last for{25}to{30}years.He often is booked ahead of jobs because he is quite well known. He works by himself but he has an apprentice to help him clear up. by{Bridget,Joanna}&{Susannah.
